title: Grammarly's liability is limited to the last 12 months of paid fees

tosdr.case: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
tosdr.tldr: Grammarly isn't liable in any event regarding the Site, Services, and/or Software for any amount in the aggregate in excess of fees you have actually paid to Grammarly during the 12 month period immediately before the event that gave rise to such liability.
